name: 小糸
text:
ごめんね、遅くなっちゃって……
雛菜ちゃんは……？
trans:
Sorry I'm late...
What about Hinana-chan...?

name: 円香
text:
買いに行った
なんか

name: 小糸
text:
そうなんだ……！
みんなはもう課題終わっちゃった？
trans:
I see...!
Have you all finished the assignment?

name: 円香
text:
全然
ちょっと休憩中
trans:
Nope.
Just taking a small break.

name: 小糸
text:
ね、眠そうだね
お疲れ様……！
trans:
Y-You sound sleepy.
Must be a tiring day...!

name: 円香
text:
小糸が来るまで
…………少し寝てた
trans:
Until you came by,
......I slept for a bit.

name: 小糸
text:
そ、そうなの？
寝不足……？
trans:
R-Really?
You didn't get enough sleep...?

name: 小糸
text: か、帰って休んだほうが……
trans: M-Maybe it'd be better if you go home and rest...

name: 円香
text:
……大丈夫
課題の続き、やらないと
trans:
...I'm good.
We have to get on with the assignment.

name: 小糸
text:
う、うん……
無理しないでね……！

name: 円香
text:
食べていいよ
ひとつ
trans:
You can eat some,
if you'd like.

name: 円香
trans: Well, it's a flavor you'd like.

name: 円香
text:
頑張ったところで、
かならず結果が出るわけじゃないけど
trans:
Even if you work hard,
there's no guarantee you'd get results.

name: 円香
text: 頑張ったことは事実だから
trans: But it's still a fact that you've worked hard,

name: 小糸
text:
ポテト……！
円香ちゃんも
trans:
Have some of these french fries too...!
Madoka-chan!

name: 小糸
text:
寝不足になるくらい……
何か、頑張ってたんだよね……？
trans:
You've worked really hard on something too, right...?
So much so that you're not getting enough sleep...

name: 小糸
text:
そういえば
この間、大丈夫だった……？
trans:
That reminds me.
Did everything turn out okay that day...?

name: 小糸
text:
事務所……
行ってみたんでしょ？
trans:
You went...
To check things out at the office, didn't you?

name: 小糸
text:
……？
あの、名刺にあった事務所……
trans:
...?
The office on that name card...

name: 小糸
text:
た、確か、名前……
えっと……
trans:
I-If I'm not wrong, it's called...
Hmm...

name: 円香
trans: The smell, of smoke beginning to form
